Test.Name: There in no Advanced Security service
Test.Description: DUT sends GetServices response without Advanced Security service

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Advanced Security service: NOT SUPPORETD Advanced Security subfeatures: NOT SUPPORETD Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: All Advanced Security service subfeatures Supported

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Advanced Security service: SUPPORETD RSA Key Pair Generation: SUPPORETD PKCS10 External Certification with RSA: SUPPORETD Self-Signed Certificate Creation with RSA: SUPPORETD TLS Server Supported: SUPPORETD Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: All Advanced Security service subfeatures are no supported: all boolean attributes=false
Test.Description:
DUT sends:
RSAKeyPairGeneration=false PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA=false SelfSignedCertificateCreationWithRSA=false TLS Server Supported: skipped

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Advanced Security service: SUPPORETD RSA Key Pair Generation: NOT SUPPORETD PKCS10 External Certification with RSA: NOT SUPPORETD Self-Signed Certificate Creation with RSA: NOT SUPPORETD TLS Server Supported: NOT SUPPORETD Other feature request is out of scope

Advanced Security service: SUPPORETD RSA Key Pair Generation: UNDEFINED PKCS10 External Certification with RSA: UNDEFINED Self-Signed Certificate Creation with RSA: UNDEFINED TLS Server Supported: UNDEFINED Other feature request is out of scope

Advanced Security service: SUPPORETD RSA Key Pair Generation: UNDEFINED PKCS10 External Certification with RSA: UNDEFINED Self-Signed Certificate Creation with RSA: UNDEFINED TLS Server Supported: UNDEFINED Other feature request is out of scope

Advanced Security service: SUPPORETD RSA Key Pair Generation: NOT SUPPORETD PKCS10 External Certification with RSA: NOT SUPPORETD Self-Signed Certificate Creation with RSA: NOT SUPPORETD TLS Server Supported: NOT SUPPORETD Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: Empty TLS Server Supported list
Test.Description: (Note: use fixed response if script will not work)

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Advanced Security service: SUPPORETD RSA Key Pair Generation: SUPPORETD PKCS10 External Certification with RSA: SUPPORETD Self-Signed Certificate Creation with RSA: SUPPORETD TLS Server Supported: NOT SUPPORETD Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: Incorrect boolean value
Test.Description: Check that thete is schema validation: sends incorrect boolean value in GetServiceCapabilities response (Note: use fixed response if script will not work) RSAKeyPairGeneration="PASSED", where PASSED is incorrect boolean value

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Advanced Security service: SUPPORETD RSA Key Pair Generation: SUPPORETD PKCS10 External Certification with RSA: SUPPORETD Self-Signed Certificate Creation with RSA: SUPPORETD TLS Server Supported: SUPPORETD Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: GetSevices not supported
Test.Description: Advanced Security service: NOT SUPPORETD Advanced Security subfeatures: NOT SUPPORETD Other feature request is out of scope
